description.value:
Aspect beast

Activate 2 envision, concentrate

Duration 1 minute

You focus on your bond with your blood-bonded animal companion. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the extra action each round only to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal}.

You may choose to take your weapon in your mouth and take on the shape of the same type of animal as your companion, as the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pcGdJvwun0tjrUTz]{Fanged} rune.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-misc.our-items.Item.v5U5fRhZFi8dmZ0D]{Effect: Fanged Rune}
